text: Turner S (2022). kgp: 1000 Genomes Project Metadata. https://github.com/stephenturner/kgp, https://stephenturner.github.io/kgp/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {kgp: 1000 Genomes Project Metadata},   author = {Stephen Turner},   year = {2022},   note = {https://github.com/stephenturner/kgp, https://stephenturner.github.io/kgp/}, }

title: 1000 Genomes Project Metadata
text: kgp data package provides metadata populations data samples 1000 Genomes Project, including 2,504 samples sequenced Phase 3 release expanded collection 3,202 samples 602 additional trios.

title: 1000 Genomes Project Metadata
text: can install released version kgp CRAN : can install development version kgp GitHub :

title: 1000 Genomes Project Metadata
text: 1000 Genomes Project data Phase 3 data contains 2,504 samples sequence data available, later expanded 3,202 samples high coverage adding 602 trios. Data available 1000 Genomes FTP site GitHub. Pilot publication: integrated map genetic variation 1,092 human genomes Phase 1 publication: map human genome variation population scale sequencing Phase 3 publication: global reference human genetic variation Expanded high-coverage publication: High-coverage whole-genome sequencing expanded 1000 Genomes Project cohort including 602 trios three data sets available kgp package. kgp3 data contains pedigree population information 2,504 samples included Phase 3 release 1000 Genomes Project data. kgpe data contains pedigree population information 3,202 samples included expanded 1000 Genomes Project data, includes 602 trios. kgpmeta contains population metadata 26 populations across five continental regions.
code: library(kgp) data(kgp) kgp3 #> # A tibble: 2,504 × 10 #>    fid     id      pid   mid     sex sexf   pop   reg   population        region #>    <chr>   <chr>   <chr> <chr> <int> <fct>  <chr> <chr> <chr>             <chr>  #>  1 HG00096 HG00096 0     0         1 male   GBR   EUR   British in Engla… Europ… #>  2 HG00097 HG00097 0     0         2 female GBR   EUR   British in Engla… Europ… #>  3 HG00099 HG00099 0     0         2 female GBR   EUR   British in Engla… Europ… #>  4 HG00100 HG00100 0     0         2 female GBR   EUR   British in Engla… Europ… #>  5 HG00101 HG00101 0     0         1 male   GBR   EUR   British in Engla… Europ… #>  6 HG00102 HG00102 0     0         2 female GBR   EUR   British in Engla… Europ… #>  7 HG00103 HG00103 0     0         1 male   GBR   EUR   British in Engla… Europ… #>  8 HG00105 HG00105 0     0         1 male   GBR   EUR   British in Engla… Europ… #>  9 HG00106 HG00106 0     0         2 female GBR   EUR   British in Engla… Europ… #> 10 HG00107 HG00107 0     0         1 male   GBR   EUR   British in Engla… Europ… #> # … with 2,494 more rows #> # ℹ Use `print(n = ...)` to see more rows kgpe #> # A tibble: 3,202 × 11 #>    fid     id      pid   mid     sex sexf   pop   reg   population region phase3 #>    <chr>   <chr>   <chr> <chr> <int> <fct>  <chr> <chr> <chr>      <chr>  <lgl>  #>  1 HG00096 HG00096 0     0         1 male   GBR   EUR   British i… Europ… TRUE   #>  2 HG00097 HG00097 0     0         2 female GBR   EUR   British i… Europ… TRUE   #>  3 HG00099 HG00099 0     0         2 female GBR   EUR   British i… Europ… TRUE   #>  4 HG00100 HG00100 0     0         2 female GBR   EUR   British i… Europ… TRUE   #>  5 HG00101 HG00101 0     0         1 male   GBR   EUR   British i… Europ… TRUE   #>  6 HG00102 HG00102 0     0         2 female GBR   EUR   British i… Europ… TRUE   #>  7 HG00103 HG00103 0     0         1 male   GBR   EUR   British i… Europ… TRUE   #>  8 HG00105 HG00105 0     0         1 male   GBR   EUR   British i… Europ… TRUE   #>  9 HG00106 HG00106 0     0         2 female GBR   EUR   British i… Europ… TRUE   #> 10 HG00107 HG00107 0     0         1 male   GBR   EUR   British i… Europ… TRUE   #> # … with 3,192 more rows #> # ℹ Use `print(n = ...)` to see more rows kgpmeta #> # A tibble: 26 × 4 #>    pop   population                          reg   region      #>    <chr> <chr>                               <chr> <chr>       #>  1 CDX   Chinese Dai in Xishuangbanna, China EAS   East Asian  #>  2 CHB   Han Chinese in Bejing, China        EAS   East Asian  #>  3 JPT   Japanese in Tokyo, Japan            EAS   East Asian  #>  4 KHV   Kinh in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam   EAS   East Asian  #>  5 CHS   Southern Han Chinese, China         EAS   East Asian  #>  6 BEB   Bengali in Bangladesh               SAS   South Asian #>  7 GIH   Gujarati Indian in Houston,TX       SAS   South Asian #>  8 ITU   Indian Telugu in the UK             SAS   South Asian #>  9 PJL   Punjabi in Lahore,Pakistan          SAS   South Asian #> 10 STU   Sri Lankan Tamil in the UK          SAS   South Asian #> # … with 16 more rows #> # ℹ Use `print(n = ...)` to see more rows

title: 1000 Genomes Project Metadata
code: library(dplyr) library(ggplot2) library(kgp) data(kgp) kgp3 %>%    count(region) #> # A tibble: 5 × 2 #>   region          n #>   <chr>       <int> #> 1 African       661 #> 2 American      347 #> 3 East Asian    504 #> 4 European      503 #> 5 South Asian   489 kgp3 %>%    count(region, population) #> # A tibble: 26 × 3 #>    region   population                                      n #>    <chr>    <chr>                                       <int> #>  1 African  African Ancestry in Southwest US               61 #>  2 African  African Caribbean in Barbados                  96 #>  3 African  Esan in Nigeria                                99 #>  4 African  Gambian in Western Division, The Gambia       113 #>  5 African  Luhya in Webuye, Kenya                         99 #>  6 African  Mende in Sierra Leone                          85 #>  7 African  Yoruba in Ibadan, Nigeria                     108 #>  8 American Colombian in Medellin, Colombia                94 #>  9 American Mexican Ancestry in Los Angeles, California    64 #> 10 American Peruvian in Lima, Peru                         85 #> # … with 16 more rows #> # ℹ Use `print(n = ...)` to see more rows kgp3 %>%    count(region, population) %>%    arrange(region, n) %>%    mutate(population=forcats::fct_inorder(population)) %>%    ggplot(aes(population, n)) +    geom_col(aes(fill=region)) +    labs(fill=NULL, x=NULL, x="N") +    coord_flip() +    theme_bw() +    theme(legend.position="bottom")

title: kgp: 1000 Genomes Project Metadata — kgp-package
text: Metadata populations data samples 1000 Genomes Project, including 2,504 samples sequenced Phase 3 release expanded collection 3,202 samples 602 additional trios. data described Auton et al. (2015) doi:10.1038/nature15393  Byrska-Bishop et al. (2022) doi:10.1016/j.cell.2022.08.004 , raw data available http://ftp.1000genomes.ebi.ac.uk/vol1/ftp/.

title: kgp: 1000 Genomes Project Metadata — kgp-package
text: Maintainer: Stephen Turner vustephen@gmail.com (ORCID)

title: 1000 Genomes Project sample data (Phase 3) — kgp3
text: Sample, pedigree, population data 2,504 samples Phase 3 release 1000 Genomes Project data.

title: 1000 Genomes Project sample data (Phase 3) — kgp3
text: tibble 2504 rows 10 columns: fid Family ID id Individual ID pid Paternal ID mid Maternal ID sex Sex (1=Male, 2=Female) sexf Sex factor pop Short population code reg Short region code population Long population description region Long region description

title: 1000 Genomes Project sample data (Phase 3) — kgp3
text: http://ftp.1000genomes.ebi.ac.uk/vol1/ftp/

title: 1000 Genomes Project sample data (Phase 3) — kgp3
text: Byrska-Bishop, Marta, et al. "High-coverage whole-genome sequencing expanded 1000 Genomes Project cohort including 602 trios." Cell 185.18 (2022): 3426-3440. 1000 Genomes Project Consortium. "global reference human genetic variation." Nature 526.7571 (2015): 68. License information available https://github.com/igsr/1000Genomes_data_indexes/blob/master/LICENSE.

title: 1000 Genomes Project sample data (Expanded) — kgpe
text: Sample, pedigree, population data 3,202 samples expanded 1000 Genomes Project data.

title: 1000 Genomes Project sample data (Expanded) — kgpe
text: tibble 3202 rows 11 columns: fid Family ID id Individual ID pid Paternal ID mid Maternal ID sex Sex (1=Male, 2=Female) sexf Sex factor pop Short population code reg Short region code population Long population description region Long region description phase3 Logical; indicates whether sample included Phase 3 release data

title: 1000 Genomes Project sample data (Expanded) — kgpe
text: http://ftp.1000genomes.ebi.ac.uk/vol1/ftp/

title: 1000 Genomes Project sample data (Expanded) — kgpe
text: Byrska-Bishop, Marta, et al. "High-coverage whole-genome sequencing expanded 1000 Genomes Project cohort including 602 trios." Cell 185.18 (2022): 3426-3440. 1000 Genomes Project Consortium. "global reference human genetic variation." Nature 526.7571 (2015): 68. License information available https://github.com/igsr/1000Genomes_data_indexes/blob/master/LICENSE.

title: 1000 Genomes Project population metadata — kgpmeta
text: Population metadata 26 populations across five continental regions.

title: 1000 Genomes Project population metadata — kgpmeta
text: tibble 26 rows 4 columns: pop Short population code reg Short region code population Long population description region Long region description

title: 1000 Genomes Project population metadata — kgpmeta
text: http://ftp.1000genomes.ebi.ac.uk/vol1/ftp/

title: 1000 Genomes Project population metadata — kgpmeta
text: Byrska-Bishop, Marta, et al. "High-coverage whole-genome sequencing expanded 1000 Genomes Project cohort including 602 trios." Cell 185.18 (2022): 3426-3440. 1000 Genomes Project Consortium. "global reference human genetic variation." Nature 526.7571 (2015): 68. License information available https://github.com/igsr/1000Genomes_data_indexes/blob/master/LICENSE.
